directions: Stir cranberries and sugar together in a large bowl. Pour water with dissolved Jell-O(R) over the cranberry mixture. Fold apple, grapes, pineapple, and pecans through the cranberry mixture.
Cover bowl with plastic wrap and refrigerate 8 hours to overnight.
ingredients: 1 (6 ounce) package strawberry-flavored gelatin (such as Jell-O®)
title: Wonderful Cranberry Relish
